game.name: Subnautic Raider
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 음량 개별 조정, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 수시 저장, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Command a steampunk submarine in thrilling underwater missions, launch torpedoes, upgrade your vessel and manage resources while exploring a dynamic oceanic world. Action, strategy, and economic management collide in Subnautic Raider.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Command a steampunk submarine in thrilling underwater missions, launch torpedoes, upgrade your vessel and manage resources while exploring a dynamic oceanic world. Action, strategy, and economic management collide in Subnautic Raider.
